reviewText: People should be paid to watch this "masterpiece" of cinematography

Very entertaining movie ! My whole family laughed all the way through. Hilarious antics by the brothers in the film and Leonard was a really gritty conman ! Great cast and good acting. Fun music and good location choices for scenes. I had a great time working behind the scenes on this movie and completely  enjoyed the comradery of the cast and crew. The comradery shows up in everyone's acting !

A movie with lots of laughs, many of which are in the details. I suggest more than one viewing (with a finger ready on the pause button!). Of course I might be a little biased as I am in the movie... Wolf Head

One of the worst movies I have ever seen.. terrible.. This is NOT a "Dumb and Dumber meets Pulp Fiction" as it is described..There are plenty of other ways to spend an hour and a half, including pulling ones eye lashed out, one by one. slowly!
Great cast, great plot, and really well made. What more could you ask for?  Probably one of the better additions I've made to my movie cabinet in years!
